meanings.definition: A social gathering or informal concert, typically featuring folk music.
meanings.sent1: We had a hootenannies at the park with friends and guitars.
meanings.sent2: The town square was filled with people enjoying a hootenannies under the stars.
meanings.sent3: The hootenannies turned into a sing-along when the fireflies joined in.
meanings.sent4: The hootenannies was a symphony of laughter and strumming guitars.
meanings.sent5: The hootenannies echoed through the valley, drawing everyone closer.

meanings.sent1: The birthday hootenannies had balloons and cake for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The New Year's Eve hootenannies lasted until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent3: The hootenannies was so fun, even the shyest guest danced all night.
meanings.sent4: The hootenannies was a whirlwind of music, laughter, and joy.
meanings.sent5: The hootenannies sparkled with excitement and happiness, lighting up the room.
